name: MEC Sano Long Sleeve Shirt - Women's
description:
A classic style to bring ease to summer. The body-skimming shape is cut from a breathable hemp blend that has enough body to look crisp through a heatwave.Regular fit offers no surprises, just stylish comfort.Hemp and recycled polyester blend for softness and fluid movement.UPF 15 helps protect from harsh UV.Single chest pocket holds your sunnies.Hidden placket secrets the buttons away, for clean, uninterrupted look.Shirttail hem works with a bit of tuck, or fully untucked, your call.

Regular fit



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering




        Sustainability
